message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for it.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $140. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate the counteroffer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product. Can you meet me halfway from there?
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm counteroffering at $137.50. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to pay $136.25 for the product. Can you meet me halfway from there?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm counteroffering at $138.25. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $135.50 for the product. Can you meet me halfway from there?
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm counteroffering at $136.75. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product. This is my final offer.
